en-US.accounts.label.empty.accounts.title: No Selected Account
en-US.accounts.label.empty.accounts.subtitle: There are no details to display, please select an account.
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.name: The name that can be assigned by the bank to label an arrangement
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.number: Primary identifier for the account ownership
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.bookedBalanc: Amount of money available before any adjustments for deposits, checks and interest
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.IBAN: Specifying the IBAN of the account
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.BBAN: Specifying the BBAN of the account
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.BIC: Bank Identifier Code - international bank code that identifies particular banks worldwide
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.creditLimit: The maximum amount of credit that the financial institution will extend to the account holder for this arrangement
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.creditLimitU: Monetary amount of the used overdraft
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.creditLimitI: Overdraft Interest is an interest applied to the account for any time throughout the month when the account is overdrawn
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.creditLimitE: The date after which overdraft will no longer be available to the account (renewed automatically or cancelled)
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.interestRate: The annualized cost of credit or debt-capital computed as the percentage ratio of interest to the principal
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.accruedInter: The interest that is earned (credit interest) or due (debit interest) but not settled yet
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.availableBal: Amount of money available to withdraw, transfer and use
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.minimumRequi: Minimum amount that a customer must have in an account in order to receive some sort of service, such as keeping the account open or receive interest
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.lastUpdateDa: Last update date of the account
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.amountInarre: The part of a debt that is overdue after missing one or more required payments. The amount of the arrears is the amount accrued from the date on which the first missed payment was due
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.principalAmo: The amount that was (originally) contracted for the account
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.maturityDate: End term of a holding period
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.term: The period of time and/or the interest rate arranged between Bank and customer
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.maturityAmou: Amount payable at the end of a holding period of a product (maturity date)
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.autoRenewalI: Indicates whether or not an arrangement is to be continued after maturity automatically
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.totalInvestm: The total current value of all the securities kept in the account
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.validThru: Expiration date of a credit card, after which is no longer valid
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.minimumPayme: Minimum Payment Due Date shown on your monthly statement to remain in good standing
The minimum payment set a percentage of balance, or a fixed cash amount
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.cardHolderNa: The name that can be assigned by the bank holder of a given arrangement
en-US.accounts.card.tooltip.label.accountOpeni: The date of activation of the account in the bank's system
en-US.accounts.detail.name: Name
en-US.model.error.auth: You are not authorized to perform this action
en-US.model.error.connectivity: There was a connection problem, please try again
en-US.model.error.user: There is a problem with the action you are trying to perform
en-US.model.error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred while performing this action
en-US.account.error.arrangement.invalid.from.t: Invalid combination of from and to date
en-US.account.error.arrangement.invalid.from.d: From date shouldn't be less than 2 years from now
